wikipedia_page.main: Douglas Wilson (born 3 March 1994) is a Northern Irish footballer who plays as a midfielder for Ballymena United in the NIFL Premiership.

link_mentions.page: List of people with surname Wilson

response: On 8 March 2013 Dougie Wilson joined Grimsby Town on loan until the end of the 2012–13 season.

Nick Proschwitz for his goal against Leyton Orient on 15 January 2013 in the FA Cup third round replay. Dougie Wilson was awarded the Young Player of the Year Award while Andy Dawson was given a Special Contribution Award for his testimonial year with the club.
